list_definition.definition: to have and/or express a desire

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s no point in wishing for a miracle
Touch the magic stone and wish
He wished that she would go away
I wish that I had never met him.

list_definition.definition: to require (to do or have something)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Do you wish to sit down, sir?
We wish to book some seats for the theatre
I’ll cancel the arrangement if you wish.

list_definition.definition: to say that one hopes for (something for someone)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I wish you the very best of luck.

list_definition.definition: a desire or longing, or the thing desired

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: It’s always been my wish to go to South America some day.
The fairy granted him three wishes

list_definition.definition: an expression of hope for success etc for someone

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He sends you his best wishes.

list_ex_of_english: However, it wished to move out of the usual definition of preventive interventions as discrete procedures addressed to a particular disease.
The unemployed wished for more financing for unemployment benefits and social assistance and single parents claimed more financing of child benefits and family benefits.
Although further work is necessary to pursue these tentative findings, they are of interest for those wishing to model macro data successfully.
The inclusion of comprehensive reference lists is helpful for professionals wishing to study individual topics further.
The different levels of government intervention must of course be taken into consideration when judging the extent to which the wishes of electors were distorted.
We found little evidence to suggest that these priorities were consistent with the expressed wishes and preferences of residents themselves.
The pain is, in this case, intentional - a means to the (laudable) end that this person wishes to achieve.
Firstly, we wished the group members to be familiar, feel confident and safe to explore their experiences and perceptions.
